title: The Careless Boyfriend
description: Gray Bowie broke the bro code: he fell in love with his best friend’s girlfriend.For years, he hid his feelings…until one terrible night, it all came to a head.Since her life blew up in high school, Knox Holliday has spent her time honing her skills as a couture wedding dress designer. But, just weeks before her debut, a freak accident wipes out her collection. The culprit: her ex’s former best friend, Gray Bowie. Gray does everything he can to get her career back on track. As they work together, they find forgiveness and start to stitch together something that looks a lot like love. But, at the very moment they realize they have a chance for something real, her ex comes back to town, bringing opportunities Gray can’t provide. This time, Gray’s not going to step aside, so he can only hope Knox will hold onto his heart.She’s his dream, but will he be hers?
author: Erika Kelly
